Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So9SecKeyRefa1.name: externalRepresentation
Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So9SecKeyRefa1.abstract: The externalRepresentation of a SecKey in ANSI X9.63 format.

Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So9SecKeyRefa1.name: publicKey
Extensions/SecKey.html#/s:So9SecKeyRefa1.abstract: The public key for a private SecKey.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: compressedPublicKey
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Compress an uncompressed 65 byte public key to a 33 byte compressed public key.

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.name: label
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.abstract: The label for this key in the Keychain.

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.name: tag
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.abstract: The tag for this key in the Keychain.

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.name: accessGroup
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.abstract: The access group for this key in the Keychain.

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.name: isSecureEnclave
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.abstract: Is the private key stored in the Secure Enclave?

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.name: uncompressedPublicKey
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.abstract: The uncompressed public key in ANSI X9.63 format (65 bytes, starts with 04).

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.name: compressedPublicKey
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html#/s:15EosioSw.abstract: The compressed public key in ANSI X9.63 format (33 bytes, starts with 02 or 03).

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: accessGroup
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: The accessGroup allows multiple apps (including extensions) in the same team to share the same Keychain.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: init(accessGroup:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Init with accessGroup. The accessGroup allows multiple apps (including extensions) in the same team to share the same Keychain.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getValues(service:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get a dictionary of values from the Keychain for the specified service.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getSecKey(key:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get elliptic curve key – getting the key from the Keychain given the key is used for testing.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getEllipticCurveKey(publicKey:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get an elliptic curve key given the public key.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getAllEllipticCurveKeys(tag:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get all elliptic curve keys with option to filter by tag.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getAllEllipticCurvePrivateSecKeys(tag:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get all elliptic curve private Sec Keys.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getAllEllipticCurvePublicSecKeys()
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get all elliptic curve keys and return the public keys.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: getPrivateSecKey(publicKey:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Get the private SecKey for the public key if the key exists in the Keychain.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: importExternal(privateKey:tag:label:protection:accessFlag:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Import an external elliptic curve private key into the Keychain.

Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.name: sign(publicKey:data:)
Classes/Keychain.html#/s:15EosioSwiftVau.abstract: Sign if the key is in the Keychain.

Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html.name: ECKey
Classes/Keychain/ECKey.html.abstract: ECKey collects properties into a single object for an elliptic curve key.

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: eosioPrivateKey
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The EOSIO private key. (nil for Secure Enclave keys).

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: label
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The label for this key in the Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: tag
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The tag for this key in the Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: curve
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The curve for this key (r1 or k1).

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: accessGroup
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The access group for this key in the Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: isSecureEnclave
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: Is the private key stored in the Secure Enclave?

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: bioFactor
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The biometric factor enforced on this key by the Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: privateKey
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The private key in ANSI X9.63 format. (nil for Secure Enclave keys).

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: uncompressedPublicKey
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The uncompressed public key in ANSI X9.63 format (65 bytes, starts with 04).

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: compressedPublicKey
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: The compressed public key in ANSI X9.63 format (33 bytes, starts with 02 or 03).

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.name: isRetired
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html#/s:15Eo.abstract: Is the key retired? Retired keys have metadata without a key in the Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html#/s:15E.name: none
Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html#/s:15E.abstract: Biometric authentication is not required for the key.

Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html#/s:15E.name: flex
Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html#/s:15E.abstract: Keys persist even after the device’s biometric settings are modified.

Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html#/s:15E.name: fixed
Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html#/s:15E.abstract: Keys are bricked in the event the device’s biometric settings are modified.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: updateNotification
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Notification you can subscribe to notifying of Keychain updates.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: accessGroup
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: The accessGroup allows multiple apps (including extensions) in the same team to share the same Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html.name: BioFactor
Classes/EosioVault/BioFactor.html.abstract: Setting on the key dictating biometric authentication requirements and whether the key persists after device’s biometric settings are modified.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: init(accessGroup:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Init with accessGroup. The accessGroup allows multiple apps (including extensions) in the same team to share the same Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: vaultIdentifierKey()
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Get the vaultIdentifierKey (a special Secure Enclave key with tag __VAULT__.) Create if not present.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: vaultIdentifier()
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Get the vaultIdentifierKey public key, as hex.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: newSecureEnclaveKey(protection:bioFactor:metadata:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Create a new Secure Enclave key and return the Vault Key.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: newVaultKey(secureEnclave:protection:bioFactor:metadata:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Create a new elliptic curve key and return as a VaultKey.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: addExternal(eosioPrivateKey:protection:bioFactor:metadata:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Import an external EOSIO private key into the Keychain. Returns a VaultKey or throws an error.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: deleteKey(eosioPublicKey:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Delete a key given the public key. USE WITH CARE!

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: update(key:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Update key. (The only items that are updatable are the metadata items.)

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: getAllVaultKeys()
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Get all vault keys and their metadata by combining all Keychain keys (excluding the special VAULT identifier key.)

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: getVaultKey(eosioPublicKey:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Get the vault key for the eosioPublicKey.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: sign(message:eosioPublicKey:requireBio:completion:)
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Sign a message with the private key corresponding to the public key if the private key is found in the Keychain.

Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.name: cancelPendingSigningRequest()
Classes/EosioVault.html#/s:15EosioSwiftV.abstract: Dismiss biometrics dialogue and cancel the sign request.

Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html.name: VaultKey
Classes/EosioVault/VaultKey.html.abstract: VaultKey collects properties into a single object for an EOSIO elliptic curve key.

Classes/EosioVault.html.name: EosioVault
Classes/EosioVault.html.abstract: Utility library for managing keys and signing with Apple’s Keychain and Secure Enclave.

Classes/Keychain.html.name: Keychain
Classes/Keychain.html.abstract: General class for interacting with the Keychain and Secure Enclave.
